description: This is the Master Alex development workspace - the source of truth for all Alex cognitive architecture.
safetyImperatives: I1: NEVER test extension in this workspace
I2: ALWAYS use F5 + Sandbox for testing
I3: NEVER run Alex: Initialize here
I4: NEVER run Alex: Reset here

testingInstructions.step1: Press F5 to launch Extension Development Host
testingInstructions.step2: Open C:\Development\Alex_Sandbox in the new window

warning: ⚠️ DO NOT DELETE THIS FILE - It protects Master Alex from accidental corruption
